 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזָּלוֺת‎</span> **noun [feminine] plural** ==constellations==, perhaps ==signs of the zodiac== (probably loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***manzaltu***</u></abbr>, ***mazaltu***, ***station***, ***abode*** (of gods) [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 457; Prol. 142</sup> [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>Kosmologie 348</sup>; compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזָּלוֺת‎</span>, ***id.***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזָּל‎</span> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַזָּלָא‎</span>, ***star of fortune or fate***Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זל נעם‎</span>[<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>] [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>95, 8</sup> ([[BDB#Vog|Vog]]; bilingual inscription; Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἀγαθῇ τύχῃ</span>); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">***zodiac*** [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>109</sup>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***mansiones lunae***, Lexicons, [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2332</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (loan-word according to [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>ZAW iii. 1883, 110</sup>. Suidas <span class="bdbLangGreek">μαζουρωθ</span> = <span class="bdbLangGreek">ζωδία</span>); — only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמַּזּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.5|2Kgs 23:5]] as object of worship (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּעַל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶשׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֵחַ‎</span>, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלצְֿבָא הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם‎</span>) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τοῖς μαζουρωθ</span>; probably= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזַּרוֺת‎</span> [[Job.38.32|Job 38:32]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזְלֵג‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזְלָגָה‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זלג‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְזִמָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זמם‎</span>..<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזְמוֺר‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זמר‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְזַמֶּרֶת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַזְמֵרָה‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זמר‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזְעָר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זער‎</span>.
